Files:

- docs/TECHNICAL_DOCUMENTATION.md
- AGENTS.md

Please update the documentation files (README.md, README_PTBR.md, docs/TECHNICAL_DOCUMENTATION.md, and AGENTS.md) to reflect the recent changes made in the codebase. Ensure that any new features, changes in functionality, or updates to dependencies are accurately documented. Additionally, review the documentation for clarity and completeness, making sure it provides a comprehensive overview of the project for both new and existing users.
